OriginalMessage.Content: <@&917912578120904731> Just to brush up on some rules: When Zero Tolerance is active if you are to be caught breaking any rules you will be striked without warning. When Peacetime is active if you are to be caught causing a priority you will be striked without warning.

AfterMessage.Content: <@&917912578120904731> Just to brush up on some rules: When Zero Tolerance is active if you are to be caught breaking any rules you will be striked without warning. When Peacetime is active if you are to be caught causing a priority you will be striked without warning. React when read
